akn:section.akn:heading: Care and maintenance of Surrender Tree site

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 2112. Care and maintenance of Surrender Tree site The American Battle Monuments Commission is responsible for the care and maintenance of the Surrender Tree site in Santiago, Cuba. (Pub. L. 105–225, Aug. 12, 1998, 112 Stat. 1276.)
